prompts: Create a colorful bird Pokemon that can mimic sounds and has vibrant feathers.
I want a Pokemon that can fly and make musical notes with its body.
Generate a cheerful bird Pokemon with a mix of green, blue, and red colors.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a parrot, with unique musical abilities and bright colors.
Imagine a playful flying Pokemon that loves to sing and play in urban areas.
Design a Pokemon with a striking black crest and a colorful body, perfect for performing.
Show me a Pokemon that combines elements of music and nature in its design.
